Race.SpecificTitle: PW Law Enforcement District -- 12.5 Mills Renewal- Sheriff - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Law Enforcement District of the Parish of St. James, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of twelve and five tenths (12.5) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $7,222,300 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of providing additional funding for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW School Dist. No. 1 Prop. No. 1 -- 9 Mills Renewal- SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide School District No. 1 Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall School District No. 1 of the Parish of St. James, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of nine (9) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $5,200,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of giving additional support to the public schools in the District dedicated to the payment of salary increases for teachers and all employees of the school system?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW School Dist. No. 1 Prop. No. 2 -- 3 Mills Renewal- SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide School District No. 1 Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall School District No. 1 of the Parish of St. James, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of three (3) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $1,733,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of giving additional support to the public schools in the District dedicated to the payment of salary increases for teachers and all employees of the school system directly involved with providing early childhood development (4 year olds)?
